ValidationRule.description: Case Owner cannot be changed by non myaerospace users
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISCHANGED(OwnerId ) && $User.Id <> "005300000044CmQ" &&( OwnerId =="00G30000002YUCS" || OwnerId =="00G30000002YUCX" || OwnerId =="00G30000002YUCc" || OwnerId =="00G30000002YUCh"|| OwnerId =="00G30000002YUCm" || OwnerId =="00G30000002YUCr"|| OwnerId =="00G30000002YUCw" || OwnerId =="00G30000002YUCi"|| OwnerId =="00G30000002Yz1z" || OwnerId =="00G30000002YUD1"|| OwnerId =="00G30000002YUD6" || OwnerId =="00G30000002YUDB"|| OwnerId =="00G30000002YUDG" ) && $Profile.Name <> $Label.API_data_Load_Profile
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only MyAerospace Portal User can change case ownership to Web Registration queue. Please assign case ownership to â€œE-Biz Web Operations"
